description.value:
Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Cat Eyes)]{Cat Eyes} You gain Low-Light Vision.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Claws)]{Claws} You gain a claw attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Jaws)]{Jaws} You gain a jaws attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and has the unarmed trait.

Heightened (4th) Add the following options to the list you can choose from.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Fish Tail)]{Fish Tail} You gain a Swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Owl Eyes)]{Owl Eyes} You gain Darkvision.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Wings)]{Wings} You gain a Fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
